# title

**Instance Property**

The title text for the task list.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var title: INSpeakableString { get }
```

## Discussion

The title text describes the purpose of the tasks.

## Getting the Task Attributes

- **tasks**: The array of individual tasks to perform.

items.description: The array of individual tasks to perform.
items.name: tasks

title: title
